thread.title: Caffeinate Happily Thanks to McDonald's Latest Line of Espresso Drinks
thread.title_full: Caffeinate Happily Thanks to McDonald's Latest Line of Espresso Drinks

author: Anna Monette Roberts
title: Caffeinate Happily Thanks to McDonald's Latest Line of Espresso Drinks
text:
McDonald's New Espresso Drinks Spring 2017 Caffeinate Happily Thanks to McDonald's Latest Line of Espresso Drinks March 20, 2017 by Anna Monette Roberts 56 Shares 
According to Brand Eating , McDonald's is testing out three new McCaf√© drinks : Caramel Macchiato (hot or iced), French Vanilla Cappuccino, and an Americano. Currently, these drinks are only available in participating Northern California locations, which have upgraded to the new $12,000 coffee machines . The best news is, between March 20-26, these drinks are only $1 for a small! That's like a sixth of the price of a similar beverage at Starbucks. But if you don't live anywhere near there, we're apt to think you can hack your drink order at any McDonald's location so long as you order what's in each drink. Here are the descriptions: 
Caramel Macchiato: Espresso, caramel-flavored syrup, steamed milk, and caramel drizzle. 
French Vanilla Cappuccino: Espresso, vanilla-flavored syrup, steamed milk. 
Americano: Espresso with hot water 
Below, find the complete list of participating counties, so you can caffeinate luxuriously with these new drinks: Sacramento
